snippet.title: #DRIVE Rally | Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
#DRIVE Rally is an arcade-inspired rally-driving experience set in the golden racing era of the ‘90s. Grab your co-driver and burn some rubber on iconic race-winning cars across a variety of terrains in some of the most iconic rallying locations in the world!

Future racers will be able to jump into this mud-slinging, high-octane experience on Windows PC, macOS, and Linux via Steam—including Steam Deck—, Epic Games Store and GOG at an Early Access price point of $19.99 USD. The release date announcement trailer showcases never-before-seen tracks, iconic rally cars, and the charm of the game’s passionate co-drivers. 

#DRIVE Rally arrives on September 25th, 2024.
Platforms: Windows PC, macOS and Linux via Steam—including Steam Deck.
Stores: Steam, Epic Games Store and GOG
Price: $19.99 USD

In #DRIVE Rally, players take the wheel and speed through over 400 km of diverse rally tracks inspired by real-world locations. With 36 customizable cars divided into 3 unique classes, players can fine-tune their vehicles to match their driving style. And let’s not forget the dynamic co-drivers who react to your every move, guiding you to victory and keeping you on your toes with their sharp commentary!

The Early Access will include:
- 4 unique locations, each with up to 24 stages that can be driven in standard or reversed modes.
- Championship mode, featuring a selection of 4 fully voiced co-drivers.
- A selection of 12 cars with unique performance stats, plus 3 different classes per car, amounting to 36 unique racers. So you can choose a ride that matches your driving style!
- Plus fixes, quality-of-life improvements, and community-driven updates based on feedback from #DRIVE Rally’s passionate community.

Following the launch, the micro-indie team (a core crew of about five people) will continue to soup up #DRIVE Rally throughout its Early Access period. Planned features include additional locations, more co-drivers, new championships, brand new cars, car livery customization, and more!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2494780?utm_source=yt&utm_campaign=datetrailer
Epic Games Store: https://store.epicgames.com/p/drive-rally-d500ef
GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/drive_rally

Official Discord: https://discord.gg/drivegame
